Fey Step.name: Fey Step
Fey Step.sourceRef: Player's Handbook, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Fey Step.fullText:
Eladrin Racial PowerFey Step

You step through the boundary between the planes, disappearing for a moment before reappearing somewhere else.

Encounter        Teleportation
Move Action      Personal

Effect: Teleport up to 5 squares.


Published in Player's Handbook, page(s) 38, Heroes of the Fallen Lands, page(s) 254.
Fey Step.flavor: You step through the boundary between the planes, disappearing for a moment before reappearing somewhere else.
Fey Step.range:
Personal

Effect: Teleport up to 5 squares.

Sense Magic.name: Sense Magic
Sense Magic.fullText:
Eladrin Racial Utility 2Sense Magic

You attune your senses to the magical world, and in a flash, nearby magic becomes as obvious as birdsong on the wind.

Encounter
Minor Action      Personal

Effect: You sense the presence of magic within 10 squares of you as if you succeeded on an Arcana check to do so. You can then make an Arcana check as a free action to identify any revealed magical phenomena, conjurations, or zones.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Sense Magic.flavor: You attune your senses to the magical world, and in a flash, nearby magic becomes as obvious as birdsong on the wind.

Eladrin Escape.name: Eladrin Escape
Eladrin Escape.fullText:
Eladrin Racial Utility 6Eladrin Escape

Your enemy has but one chance to corner you. Wasting it gives you the opportunity to flee.

Encounter      Teleportation
Immediate Reaction      Personal

Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Effect: You teleport up to 5 squares.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Eladrin Escape.flavor: Your enemy has but one chance to corner you. Wasting it gives you the opportunity to flee.
Eladrin Escape.range:
Personal

Trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Effect: You teleport up to 5 squares.
Eladrin Escape.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.

Recursive Thought.name: Recursive Thought
Recursive Thought.fullText:
Eladrin Racial Utility 10Recursive Thought

When you clear your mind, your affliction bounces back to your unsuspecting foe.

Daily
Free Action      Special

Trigger: You save against a dazing or stunning effect.

Target: The enemy that subjected you to the effect

Effect: The target is subjected to the effect you saved against until the end of your next turn.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Recursive Thought.flavor: When you clear your mind, your affliction bounces back to your unsuspecting foe.

Spiral Dance Assault.name: Spiral Dance Assault
Spiral Dance Assault.fullText:
Eladrin Racial Utility 16Spiral Dance Assault

You strike and dance away, only to reappear at your enemy’s side.

At-Will (Special)      Teleportation
Free Action      Personal

Trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack on your turn.

Effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the enemy.

Special: You can use this power only once per round.


Published in Dragon Magazine 405.
Spiral Dance Assault.flavor: You strike and dance away, only to reappear at your enemy’s side.

Effect: You teleport to a square adjacent to the enemy.

Special: You can use this power only once per round.
